info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 7:42PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Jones County through 830 PM CDT... At 742 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Noodle, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Anson, Hawley, Noodle, Funston, Hodges, Stith and Truby. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for west central Texas.
